features.taxSupport: Help with green receipts & quarterly tax filing

legal.title: Important legal notice
legal.body: Brivida is not a certified accountant and does not provide tax advice in the legal sense. Our service covers organizational guidance and support during your official registration as a self-employed professional. All actions and submissions are performed by you using your Digital Mobile Key.
legal.disclaimer: For complex tax matters, please consult a certified accountant.

duration.question: How long does the process take?
duration.answer: Usually 1‚Äì2 weeks, depending on Citizen‚Äôs Shop availability and case complexity.

digitalKey.question: Do I need the Digital Mobile Key?
digitalKey.answer: Yes, it‚Äôs required for all online processes. If you don‚Äôt have it, we‚Äôll guide you through how to get it.

documents.question: What documents do I need?
documents.answer: Citizen Card/Passport, proof of address, IBAN, and other case-specific documents if necessary.

refund.question: Can I cancel or request a refund?
refund.answer: You can cancel before the accompaniment starts. Once it begins, refunds aren‚Äôt possible.

step1.title: Everything about this job
step1.body: Check size, rooms, price and current status before you plan.

step2.title: Services & extras
step2.body: The chips show what needs cleaning. Confirm you can deliver extras like windows or ironing.

step3.title: Exact address
step3.body: Authorized users see the full address and arrival hints. Copy it or open the map for navigation.

step4.title: Notes from the client
step4.body: Read special instructions, photos or access notes so there are no surprises on site.

step5.title: Live location updates
step5.body: When enabled, follow the customer's arrival status and share your own route in real time.

step6.title: Comfort checklist
step6.body: Use the comfort tools to tick off supplies, parking and handover before you finish.

step1.title: Complete the job
step1.body: Use this screen to mark the job as done once cleaning is finished.

step2.title: Quick check before closing
step2.body: Upload optional photos, confirm the rooms cleaned and note any open points.

step3.title: Payment status
step3.body: See whether the escrow payment is ready for release or if something still needs review.

step4.title: Accept the result
step4.body: Tap Accept to release the payout or open a dispute if something is missing.

step5.title: Send a completion note
step5.body: Add a friendly summary for the client and send it to request approval.

step6.title: All set!
step6.body: The job is now marked as complete. Continue to reviews or return to your jobs.
